A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've had a think about the direction Disney has taken the latest Star Wars movie and I wanted to see The Force Awakens several times and Rogue One many times as well - but The Last Jedi - once is enough. I've been trying to work out why\, and I think it is because Disney has now moved this movie and the last one away from what Star Wars really is. I reckon Disney is writing the scripts to make sure they can make offshoots and side stories rather than making films as artwork - like George Lucas did. There are too many questions rather than answers after The Last Jedi and now their writing has put them in a dilemma\, kept alive someone who is dead and killed off someone who is alive.
